problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, PA, PB, AB are all tangent to ⊙O, ∠P = N_0, then ∠AOB is equal to ()
raw_answer: 解:设PA、PB、AB与⊙O相切于E、D、C,连接OE、OD、OC,如图,∴PA、PB、AB都与⊙O相切,∴OE⊥AB,OD⊥PB,OC⊥PA,∴∠COD=180°-∠P=120°,在Rt△AOC和Rt△AOE中\begin{cases}OA=OA\\0C=OE\end{cases},∴Rt△AOC≌Rt△AOE,同理可得△OBD≌△OBE,∴∠AOC=∠AOE,∠BOD=∠BOE,∴∠AOB=\frac{1}{2}∠COD=60°．故选:B．
